text: ==War== He broke with the Caliphate and was on the brink of a war with it until the Caliph accepted him as Sultan of Iran, Khorasan, and Turkestan in 1198.Juvaini, Ala-ad-Din Ata-Malik, History of the World Conqueror, Manchester University Press, Manchester, 1997. p. 314. ==References== Category:Conflicts Category:Wars involving Asia Category:12th century in Asia Category:History of Kazakhstan
title: Capture of Turkestan (1198)
